description: This file defines a route component for editing a note in a note-taking application. It manages loading the note data, editing the note's title and content, updating the note via API calls, and deleting the note. It also handles UI states such as loading, saving, and error messages.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Function to save the updated note by calling the updateNote API and handling UI state.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Function to delete the current note after user confirmation.
